A figure snuck through the woods silently, watching the battle 
between the Alliance and the Maximals silently. He had his stealth 
mode on, so there was no possible way he could be detected, unless 
one saw the slight indents his hooves made on the ground.

His body was like one of a cenataur, yet slightly different. He had 
horse legs and body, but where the horse chest would be was a 
slightly human torso, with strong looking arms and chest. His face 
had no mouth, just a nose, pointed ears, and two black almond eyes. 
Atop his head sat two stalk eyes which could twist in any direction. 
Where the horse tail would be, was a 2 meters long tail, with a 
scythe like blade, wickedly sharp and coated with poison, on the end.

The stalk eyes swiveled slowly as he watched the battle, deciding the 
attakers were indeed stronger, but the defenders had the heart in 
them. He sniggered. 

For now, he would be content to watch. 

His Stasis Pod had crashed not too far away from here, but since 
everybot was so consumed in this battle, he had snuck out and 
discovered the new world on his own.

With a curious cock of his head, he noted neither faction seemed to 
have any leader. They were both disorganised, frantically firing in a 
fight to save their lives, no control whatsoever. With simple 
planning, the Attackers would win easily.

As he watched, he occasionally heard words being called out. Names, 
obviously. He didn't have a name. Staring into the night sky with his 
stalk eyes, but keeping his main eyes on the battle, a whisper 
floated into his head.

'Diabo..' It said. He would have smiled, if he had a mouth. A perfect 
name. A name that protrayed his personality. A name that his leader 
had used once.

(OOC: Diabo actually means Devil.. or Evil Soul in Spanish.., I'll 
send in a Profile soon)
